sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The tragedy of Antigone, the Theban princesse. Written by T.M. May, Thomas, 1595-1650.
[80] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sould at his shop, at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate, London : 1631.
Dedication signed: Tho. May. In verse. Signatures: A-E. The first leaf is blank except for an ornament. With a final colophon leaf; the last two leaves are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[80] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sould at his shop, at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate, London : 1631.
Dedication signed: Tho. May. In verse. Signatures: A-E. The first leaf is blank except for an ornament. With a final colophon leaf; the last two leaves are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

his shop, at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate
